data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - The Simple Life Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Looking for music to accompany your perfect farm or quiet farming village? The Simple Life is composed with rural atmosphere in mind.

Created by Elijah Mills, this music pack is perfect for creating the idyllic atmosphere of days spent on a bustling farm. From busy Sunday markets to quiet evenings spent sitting on the porch, The Simple Life is simply charming.

Music preview on Soundcloud

This pack contains:
  • 10 BGM tracks suitable for farms, quiet villages and rural areas.
  • A great companion to Celianna's Rural Farm Tileset.
  • .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
